section.title: For help using NetBpm or general information...
section.p: The NetBpm forums is the best place to start. They are monitored by the NetBpm developers and other experienced users. Describe your problem clearly and be sure to indicate the version of NebBpm you are using.

section.title: To report a Bug...
section.p: Submit the problem to our Bug List after checking that it hasn't already been reported. Be sure to indicate the version of NetBpm you are using. If you aren't sure that a problem is a bug, ask on the forums first.

section.title: To get commercial support...
section.p: contact support at NetBpm dot org
